requestBody.title: Invite and provision business member API Trace

resultPayload.note: Repeated unauthorized hold attempts were blocked (403).

data.instruction: Trigger repeated booking/hold-like attempts to validate throttling, expiry, or non-blocking demand visibility behavior.
data.expectedResult: Abusive attempts are rate-limited or isolated without blocking legitimate customer flow.

resultPayload.note: Repeated unauthorized hold attempts were blocked (403).

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Government Service Queue (DMV/Office). Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

data.instruction: Configure pricing defaults for the offer lifecycle including call fees/manual surge if UC needs imply it.
data.expectedResult: Pricing model persists and future bookings can calculate totals deterministically.
